data.actual_result: The tag go through and you get the full username and discriminator with the first to numbers referencing to the text channel
data.short_description: When there is a channel that has your guest two digits if your discriminator @ mentions mess up
data.steps_to_repro: - Create or join a test server - Make a text channel that has your first two digits of your discriminator (for example for me it would be 98) - Tag yourself
